Global Opt does full cycle logistics from China to Russia

CARGO DELIVERY FROM CHINA

TO RUSSIA AND THE CIS BY ALL KINDS OF TRANSPORT

  • We carry out transportation of oversized and large-tonnage cargo

  • We independently declare and carry out customs clearance with optimization of codes and rates

  • We carry out direct deliveries from factories from door to door

  • We carry out express delivery in 1-2 days from Guangzhou to Moscow from 25$ / kg

There are opportunities of working with GlobalOpt

  • We have offices in China and Russia

    Offices are located in Moscow, the capital of Russia, and in Guangzhou, China's world trade metropolis.

  • We declare the cargo with a benefit for you

    We go to meet our clients and help to clear the goods with the optimization of codes and rates.

  • Qualified staff

    Our employees have extensive experience in logistics with China and are fluent in Chinese and English.

  • We search for manufacturers

    We help our clients to find the product or manufacturer of interest to you in China.

  • Own warehouse in China

    Our warehouse in China allows you to collect and inspect and pack your goods before shipping.

  • Transferring money to China

    We help translate and pay for goods in China on preferential terms.

  • We do wholesale turnkey deliveries

    We take care of all the worries associated with the purchase, quality control, logistics and customs clearance. All you need to do is fill out the terms of reference, approve samples of goods and then accept the goods at your warehouse!

  • Manufacturing trip to China

    We have extensive experience in business travel in China. We are happy and willing to organize such a trip to China on a turnkey basis. We will make a visa transfer from the airport, book a hotel and provide an interpreter. We organize a trip to production. Shop tour. Furniture tour.

Our job is more than just delivery

We organize transportation from China promptly and reliably, taking into account the characteristics of the cargo and your requirements in terms of time and budget.

  • Cargo insurance

    All cargoes logistics which are carried out by Global Opt are insured. We guarantee full reimbursement of the cost of the goods in cases stipulated by the insurance agreement. Our company takes care of all your concerns.

  • Last mile logistics

    We deliver your cargo to a specific address. Delivery is agreed by the managers by phone one day and one hour before delivery. We also provide loader services at the place of delivery.

  • We always look ahead

    The philosophy of our company is to make ourselves and our partners around the world successful and rich. Therefore, we are always open to dialogue about partnership and investment.

We have our agent in China

Russian-speaking representatives of the company will easily find exactly the product that will meet your requests both in quality and in price.

We offer prices for any delivery option

We transport goods over long distances without any restrictions.
We will deliver any cargo on time.

  • Shipping by sea

    Delivery 35-50 days

    from 0.3 $ per 1 kg

    We carry out sea transportation of goods from China to Russia in 35 days with the passage of customs.

  • Delivery by train

    Delivery 15-28 days

    from 1 $ per 1 kg

    We carry out railway transportation of goods from China to Russia from 2 weeks with the passage of customs.

  • Delivery by truck

    Delivery 12-20 days

    from 1 $ per 1 kg

    Trucking of goods from China to Russia from 2 weeks with the passage of customs.

  • Delivery by plane

    Delivery 1-12 days

    from 6 $ per 1 kg

    We carry out air transportation of goods from China to Russia up to 2 weeks with the passage of customs.

Ordering free consultation

Our managers

We will select the optimal cargo transportation scheme for you. They will control purchases
and organize direct deliveries from the manufacturer.

Working principles

  • Order

    You leave the application on our website or call us.

  • Analytics

    We calculate options for the delivery of your cargo.

  • Contract

    We conclude an agreement with you on the delivery of goods from China.

  • Delivery to our warehouse

    We contact your supplier in China and agree on the delivery of goods to our warehouse.

  • Checking cargo

    We check, collect and pack before sending your cargo in our warehouse.

  • Delivery of cargo

    We transport your cargo to its destination and carry out customs clearance.

  • Payment

    You pay for the delivery of the goods upon receipt.

reviews of our clients

We always try to help our clients so that they contact us again.
